draw.template: Match between {{{ home }}} and {{{ visitor }}} ended {{{ home-score }}}-{{{ visitor-score }}}.
{{{ home }}} and {{{ visitor }}} finished their{{{ match-description }}} match in {{{ home-score }}}-{{{ visitor-score }}} draw.
{{{ home }}} and {{{ visitor }}} ended in draw {{{ home-score }}}-{{{ visitor-score }}} in their{{{ match-description }}} match.

win.template: Match between {{{ home }}} and {{{ visitor }}} ended {{{ home-score }}}-{{{ visitor-score }}}.
{{{ winner }}} won{{{ match-description }}} match against {{{ loser }}} with score {{{ winner-score }}}-{{{ loser-score }}}.
{{{ loser }}} was defeated {{{ winner-score }}}-{{{ loser-score }}} by {{{ winner }}} in their{{{ match-description }}} match today.

big-win.template: {{{ loser }}} was totally defeated by {{{ winner }}} with results {{{ loser-score }}}-{{{ winner-score }}}.
{{{ loser }}} was embarrassingly defeated {{{ winner-score }}}-{{{ loser-score }}} by {{{ winner }}} in their{{{ match-description }}} match today.
